spell_tooltip.description: Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 196,676 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 78,026 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 77,356 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 77,450 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 10 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 14,549 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.3 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 338,050 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 33% chance to trigger three extra attacks, dealing 33,016 Physical damage each.

Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 208,826 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon. Lava Lash will spread Flame Shock from your target to 5 nearby targets.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 345,019 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 3% or Mastery by 6% for 10 sec.

If Lava Burst is known, Elemental Blast replaces Lava Burst and gains 1 additional charge.
Melee auto-attacks with Flametongue Weapon active have a 5% chance to reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by 75% and increase the damage of Lava Lash by 40% for 6 sec.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 128,621 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Shatters a line of earth in front of you with your main hand weapon, causing 374,935 Flamestrike damage and Incapacitating any enemy hit for 2 sec.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Each time Flame Shock deals periodic damage, it increases the damage of your next Lava Lash by 8% up to 64%, and reduces the cooldown of your Lava Lash by 0.5 sec.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 215,621 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 66,313 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.

The cooldown of Sundering is reduced by 10 sec, but it can no longer Incapacitate. 

Sundering has a 40% chance to reset its own cooldown, increased by 12% for up to 5 targets. Each consecutive reset reduces these chances by half.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 895,918 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 20%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 100% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.
Consuming 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your Physical and Frost abilities by 25% for 8 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Primordial Storm
Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 154,934 Flamestrike, 155,064 Froststrike, 155,640 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased damage.

Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Elemental Blast has a chance to unleash a Surging Bolt at your Surging Totem, increasing the totem's damage by 10%, and then redirecting the bolt to your target for 158,303 Nature damage. The damage bonus effect can stack.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

Lava Lash has a chance to summon a Searing Totem to hurl Searing Bolts that deal 86,667 Fire damage to a nearby enemy. Lasts 8 sec.

Frost Shocks empowered by Hailstorm, Lava Lash, and Fire Nova cause your Searing totems to shoot a Searing Volley at up to 5 nearby enemies for 168,282 Fire damage.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 570,988 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

While Hot Hand is active Lash Lava shatters the earth, causing a Sundering at 50% effectiveness.

Sunderings from this effect do not Incapacitate.

Increases the chance for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

When Flametongue Weapon triggers from Windfury Weapon attacks, it has a chance to gather a whirl of flame around the target, dealing 300% of its damage to all nearby enemies.
Increases the critical strike chance of Flametongue Weapon by 25%, and its critical strike damage by 100%.
Casting Sundering within 40 yards of your Surging Totem causes it to create a Tremor at 100% effectiveness at the target area.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Air: Your next Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning or Elemental Blast unleashes 3 Surging Bolts at your Surging Totem.

Earth: Direct damage of your next Flame Shock is increased by 300% and it is applied to 5 nearby enemies.

Fire: Your next Lava Lash or Fire Nova grants you Hot Hand for 6 sec.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 198,568 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 167,512 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman.

Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.

Your Stormstrike casts restore 2,625 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.
Stormstrike has a 25% chance to strike the target an additional time for 40% of normal damage. This effect can chain off of itself.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.
Lava Lash and Sundering increases the damage of Flame Shock on its target by 100% for 20 sec.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 882,260 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 20%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 100% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.
Consuming 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your Physical and Frost abilities by 25% for 8 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Primordial Storm
Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 152,144 Flamestrike, 155,149 Froststrike, 154,759 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased damage.

Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Elemental Blast has a chance to unleash a Surging Bolt at your Surging Totem, increasing the totem's damage by 10%, and then redirecting the bolt to your target for 158,303 Nature damage. The damage bonus effect can stack.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

Lava Lash has a chance to summon a Searing Totem to hurl Searing Bolts that deal 85,518 Fire damage to a nearby enemy. Lasts 8 sec.

Frost Shocks empowered by Hailstorm, Lava Lash, and Fire Nova cause your Searing totems to shoot a Searing Volley at up to 5 nearby enemies for 165,725 Fire damage.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 570,988 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

While Hot Hand is active Lash Lava shatters the earth, causing a Sundering at 50% effectiveness.

Sunderings from this effect do not Incapacitate.

Increases the chance for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

When Flametongue Weapon triggers from Windfury Weapon attacks, it has a chance to gather a whirl of flame around the target, dealing 300% of its damage to all nearby enemies.
Increases the critical strike chance of Flametongue Weapon by 25%, and its critical strike damage by 100%.
Casting Sundering within 40 yards of your Surging Totem causes it to create a Tremor at 100% effectiveness at the target area.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Air: Your next Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning or Elemental Blast unleashes 3 Surging Bolts at your Surging Totem.

Earth: Direct damage of your next Flame Shock is increased by 300% and it is applied to 5 nearby enemies.

Fire: Your next Lava Lash or Fire Nova grants you Hot Hand for 6 sec.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 193,913 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 77,689 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 14,513 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.3 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 338,050 every 5 sec for 30 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 33% chance to trigger three extra attacks, dealing 32,830 Physical damage each.

Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 207,605 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon. Lava Lash will spread Flame Shock from your target to 5 nearby targets.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 354,626 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 3% or Mastery by 6% for 10 sec.

If Lava Burst is known, Elemental Blast replaces Lava Burst and gains 1 additional charge.
Melee auto-attacks with Flametongue Weapon active have a 5% chance to reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by 75% and increase the damage of Lava Lash by 40% for 6 sec.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 128,621 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Shatters a line of earth in front of you with your main hand weapon, causing 372,856 Flamestrike damage and Incapacitating any enemy hit for 2 sec.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Each time Flame Shock deals periodic damage, it increases the damage of your next Lava Lash by 8% up to 64%, and reduces the cooldown of your Lava Lash by 0.5 sec.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 215,469 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 66,341 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.

The cooldown of Sundering is reduced by 10 sec, but it can no longer Incapacitate. 

Sundering has a 40% chance to reset its own cooldown, increased by 12% for up to 5 targets. Each consecutive reset reduces these chances by half.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.
Lava Lash and Sundering increases the damage of Flame Shock on its target by 100% for 20 sec.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 882,431 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 10%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 50% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.
Consuming 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your Physical and Frost abilities by 25% for 8 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 153,600 Flamestrike, 153,448 Froststrike, 154,616 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased damage.

Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Elemental Blast has a chance to unleash a Surging Bolt at your Surging Totem, increasing the totem's damage by 10%, and then redirecting the bolt to your target for 158,303 Nature damage. The damage bonus effect can stack.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

Lava Lash has a chance to summon a Searing Totem to hurl Searing Bolts that deal 85,606 Fire damage to a nearby enemy. Lasts 8 sec.

If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 570,988 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

Increases the chance for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects.

Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.3 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 338,050 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 33% chance to trigger three extra attacks, dealing 32,846 Physical damage each.

Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 210,074 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon. Lava Lash will spread Flame Shock from your target to 5 nearby targets.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 351,104 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 3% or Mastery by 6% for 10 sec.

If Lava Burst is known, Elemental Blast replaces Lava Burst and gains 1 additional charge.
Melee auto-attacks with Flametongue Weapon active have a 5% chance to reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by 75% and increase the damage of Lava Lash by 40% for 6 sec.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 128,621 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Each time Flame Shock deals periodic damage, it increases the damage of your next Lava Lash by 8% up to 64%, and reduces the cooldown of your Lava Lash by 0.5 sec.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.
Stormstrike has a 25% chance to strike the target an additional time for 40% of normal damage. This effect can chain off of itself.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.
Lava Lash and Sundering increases the damage of Flame Shock on its target by 100% for 20 sec.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 880,140 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 20%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 100% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.
Consuming 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your Physical and Frost abilities by 25% for 8 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Primordial Storm
Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 154,300 Flamestrike, 156,198 Froststrike, 155,892 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased damage.

Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Elemental Blast has a chance to unleash a Surging Bolt at your Surging Totem, increasing the totem's damage by 10%, and then redirecting the bolt to your target for 158,303 Nature damage. The damage bonus effect can stack.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

Lava Lash has a chance to summon a Searing Totem to hurl Searing Bolts that deal 87,671 Fire damage to a nearby enemy. Lasts 8 sec.

Frost Shocks empowered by Hailstorm, Lava Lash, and Fire Nova cause your Searing totems to shoot a Searing Volley at up to 5 nearby enemies for 168,687 Fire damage.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 570,988 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

While Hot Hand is active Lash Lava shatters the earth, causing a Sundering at 50% effectiveness.

Sunderings from this effect do not Incapacitate.

Increases the chance for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

Casting Sundering within 40 yards of your Surging Totem causes it to create a Tremor at 100% effectiveness at the target area.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.

Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 33% chance to trigger three extra attacks, dealing 32,902 Physical damage each.

Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 209,746 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon. Lava Lash will spread Flame Shock from your target to 5 nearby targets.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 349,596 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 3% or Mastery by 6% for 10 sec.

If Lava Burst is known, Elemental Blast replaces Lava Burst and gains 1 additional charge.
Melee auto-attacks with Flametongue Weapon active have a 5% chance to reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by 75% and increase the damage of Lava Lash by 40% for 6 sec.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 128,621 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Shatters a line of earth in front of you with your main hand weapon, causing 373,556 Flamestrike damage and Incapacitating any enemy hit for 2 sec.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Each time Flame Shock deals periodic damage, it increases the damage of your next Lava Lash by 8% up to 64%, and reduces the cooldown of your Lava Lash by 0.5 sec.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 219,866 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 65,381 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.

The cooldown of Sundering is reduced by 10 sec, but it can no longer Incapacitate. 

Sundering has a 40% chance to reset its own cooldown, increased by 12% for up to 5 targets. Each consecutive reset reduces these chances by half.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.
Lava Lash and Sundering increases the damage of Flame Shock on its target by 100% for 20 sec.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 890,004 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 10%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 50% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.
Consuming 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your Physical and Frost abilities by 25% for 8 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 157,581 Flamestrike, 154,746 Froststrike, 155,035 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 169,644 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Chills the target with frost, causing 116,665 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 10 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.3 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 338,050 every 5 sec for 30 sec.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 221,551 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 65,095 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.

The cooldown of Sundering is reduced by 10 sec, but it can no longer Incapacitate. 

Sundering has a 40% chance to reset its own cooldown, increased by 12% for up to 5 targets. Each consecutive reset reduces these chances by half.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 903,693 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
